resources.string: This app is used for Tracking Bluetooth devices around you

The Covid-19 Trace Application helps you track whether you are a Supervisory Person (ODP) based on the history data of your interactions with others.

This application will turn on your Bluetooth at any time and save data on other devices around you.

When there is Patients under surveillance (PDP) who report being infected with the Covid-19 virus and have a history of contact with you, the system will provide that information to you.

Likewise if you are infected with Covid-19, you can share information to all potential ODP based on a history of nearby saved devices.

Your personal data will not be displayed. Because this application does not require you to fill in any personal data.

Let's be part of the Covid-19 Prevention Solution!

Let\'s join forces to prevent Covid-19 spreads. Install SekitarKita Apps to record your nearby contact and early warning of Covid-19 Infection. \\nVisit the following link https://sekitarkita.id/ for furhter information \\nor download SekitarKita at https://sekitarkita.id/download
